items.sentence: Tom tried to persuade Mary to do something she knew she shouldn\'t do.
What you just suggested makes much more sense than what Tom suggested.
Even though Tom used to be my best friend, I\'m beginning to hate him.
I can\'t figure out how Tom managed to lose so much weight so quickly.
Tom realized that Mary wasn\'t paying attention to what he was saying.
How did you discover that Tom was the one who had embezzled the money?
If you create a popular app, you could become a millionaire overnight.
Tom took Mary to his favorite restaurant on their wedding anniversary.
Tom said he wondered if Mary and I\'d be able to do that by ourselves.
Tom told Mary that he didn\'t want to get married until he was thirty.
